description: Service configuration for a pantry service
title: Service configuration for a pantry

pantryId.description: [Output only] Unique ID of food pantry

maxOccurrencesInWeekPerHH.description: Max occurrences of particular service per household per week

maxOccurrencesInMonthPerHH.description: Max occurrences of particular service per household per month

minServicesInMonthPerHH.description: Minimum number of services per household per month required for eligibility for service

isActive.description: Flag to indicate if a service is active

isCommoditiesEligibleRequired.description: Flag to indicate if a household must be commodities eligible to receive service

isHomelessRequired.description: Flag to indicate if a household must be homeless to receive service

isMeasuredInActualPounds.description: Flag to indicate if a service is measured in actual pounds

numberPoundsFamilySize1.description: Number of pounds allowed for service for family with size of 1

numberPoundsFamilySize2.description: Number of pounds allowed for service for family with size of 2

numberPoundsFamilySize3.description: Number of pounds allowed for service for family with size of 3

numberPoundsFamilySize4.description: Number of pounds allowed for service for family with size of 4

numberPoundsFamilySize5.description: Number of pounds allowed for service for family with size of 5

numberPoundsFamilySize6.description: Number of pounds allowed for service for family with size of 6

numberPoundsFamilySize7.description: Number of pounds allowed for service for family with size of 7

numberPoundsFamilySize8.description: Number of pounds allowed for service for family with size of 8

numberPoundsFamilySize9.description: Number of pounds allowed for service for family with size of 9

numberPoundsFamilySize10.description: Number of pounds allowed for service for family with size of 10

numberPoundsFamilySizeDelta.description: Number of incremental pounds allowed for service for each family member beyond 10

createdAt.description: [Output only] Creation time of the user role

createdBy.description: [Output only] Creator of the user role

updatedAt.description: [Output only] Last modification time of the user role

updatedBy.description: [Output only] User to last modify the user role
